title: John Burnet of Barns: A Romance
author: Buchan, John
snippet: But now itbehooved me to be cautious, so I kept straight over the hills; and,striking the source of a stream called Hopecarton, followed it to whereit joined the river in the Mossfennan haughs.

title: John Burnet of Barns: A Romance
author: Buchan, John
snippet: And now we were on the wild ridgeof upland which heads the glens of Stanhope and Hopecarton and Polmood,the watershed 'twixt the vales of Tweed and Yarrow.
